about_the_game:
In order to survive 15 minutes of merciless attacking waves of demons, you must become an unstoppable force of destruction. Choose from a variety of active and passive abilities, summon powerful allies, place deadly turrets, collect special weapons, fight mighty Bosses and more. Switch between different characters and equip them with unique items to create a build that fits your playstyle.

Story


Sky World is an endless heaven with hundreds of inhabited floating islands, each with its own people and culture. But now, an evil overlord with his demon army has attacked the once peaceful realm and is spreading chaos and corruption.
Fortunately, a group of brave resistance fighters from all over Sky World has combined their forces to liberate each island from the evil influence.

You play as Aryx, a fearless fox fighter who is accompanied by his supersonic turtle mount and Brian, a tiny but wise bear with a jetpack. Together, the heroic trio steps up to face the entire demonic war machine.

Features

  • Rise from rookie to god of destruction in intense 15 minute runs
  • Fast-paced combat and movement
  • Upgrade an arsenal of active, passive and stat abilities
  • Meta progression with mighty Powerups and Weapons
  • Loot powerful Items from Bosses
  • Unlock multiple maps and explore the diverse regions of Sky World

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280

short_description: Slyders is a FPS survival roguelite bullet hell that blends fast-paced shooter action with an over-the-top upgrade system. You’re Aryx, a fearless fox freedom fighter on his supersonic battle turtle who aims to liberate Sky World from evil.
